title: US keyboard with Swedish soft layout
snippet: Recently I have started to code more than usual and finally gave in to the trend and got myself a mechanical keyboard. It ended up being a Royal Kludge 71 (budget version of Calibur V2 TE RGB perhaps?), a mechanical Bluetooth 71% keyboard. All’n’all, pretty good stuff for a good price but there w...

title: First post
snippet: …well, this is the first post to see how this works out. More will come later…
